  children={"获取某个Pull Request的所有评论"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v5/repos/{owner}/{repo}/pulls/{number}/comments"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>





<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"owner","in":"path","description":"仓库所属空间地址(企业、组织或个人的地址path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"repo","in":"path","description":"仓库路径(path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"number","in":"path","description":"第几个PR，即本仓库PR的序数","required":true,"example":0,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},{"name":"page","in":"query","description":"当前页码","required":false,"example":0,"schema":{"type":"integer","description":"当前页码","format":"int32"}},{"name":"per_page","in":"query","description":"每页的项目数","required":false,"example":0,"schema":{"type":"integer","description":"每页的项目数","format":"int32"}},{"name":"direction","in":"query","description":"可选。升序/降序","required":false,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string","description":"可选。升序/降序","enum":["asc","desc"]}},{"name":"comment_type","in":"query","description":"可选。筛选评论类型。代码行评论/pr普通评论","required":false,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string","description":"可选。筛选评论类型。代码行评论/pr普通评论","enum":["diff_comment","pr_comment"]}},{"name":"noteType","in":"query","description":"","required":false,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
